name: Searching for a term

testSteps.description: Given Sergey is researching things on the internet

children.description: Sergey opens the Wikipedia home page
Sergey opens the Wikipedia home page
he enters 'Cucumber' then hits [ENTER] into search field

testSteps.description: Then he should see information about "Cucumber"

children.description: he should see article identifier with text value that is equal to: <"Cucumber">
